message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe would be very valuable for you. I'm asking for $14,000. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your time and consideration, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand your perspective, but $11,500 is a bit too low for me. Would you consider $13,000?  I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations and bring significant value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I need to be mindful of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $12,250?
